import React from "react"; export default function RecentVulns() { // Dummy data const vulns = [ { cve: "CVE-2024-1234", title: "Cisco IOS XE Web UI Privilege Escalation", vendor: "Cisco", severity: "Critical", cvss: 9.8, status: "Active", published: "Oct 5, 2024" }, { cve: "CVE-2024-5678", title: "Juniper Networks Junos OS Command Injection", vendor: "Juniper", severity: "High", cvss: 8.1, status: "Under Investigation", published: "Oct 3, 2024" }, { cve: "CVE-2024-9012", title: "Honeywell Experion PKS Buffer Overflow", vendor: "Honeywell", severity: "Medium", cvss: 5.3, status: "Resolved", published: "Sep 28, 2024" } ]; const pillClass = sev => ["pill", sev.toLowerCase()].join(' '); return (

Recent Vulnerabilities

{vulns.map(v => ( ))}
CVE Title Vendor Severity CVSS Status Published Actions
{v.cve} {v.title} {v.vendor} {v.severity} {v.cvss} {v.status} {v.published}
); }
